channel.title: Comments on: Microsoft’s InkSeine Offers An Intuitive Tablet Interface

item.title: By: Russell Heimlich
item.dc:creator: Russell Heimlich
item.description: You should totally watch it with the sound. The demonstrator makes some key points about using the pen-centric interface.
item.content:encoded: You should totally watch it with the sound. The demonstrator makes some key points about using the pen-centric interface.

item.title: By: Pammy
item.dc:creator: Pammy
item.description: That is really cool, kinda confusing to tell what's goin on with my sound off though, haha.
item.content:encoded: That is really cool, kinda confusing to tell what’s goin on with my sound off though, haha.
